decks.notes: The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly build up a strong board presence with efficient creatures like Keen-Eyed Curator and Ouroboroid while utilizing cards like Gene Pollinator and Badgermole Cub to generate additional value. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggression and resource management, utilizing cards like Multiversal Passage and Nature's Rhythm to maintain momentum. Additionally, cards like Overlord of the Balemurk and Sentinel of Lost Lore provide additional threats and card advantage to outpace opponents in the late game.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on controlling the game through card advantage and removal spells, utilizing powerful cards like Consult the Star Charts and Jeskai Revelation to draw cards and gain life. The deck includes a mix of counterspells, board wipes like Day of Judgment, and versatile removal spells like Lightning Helix and Abrade to deal with threats. Additionally, the deck runs a few key enchantments like Rest in Peace to disrupt graveyard strategies and Cursed Recording for additional card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through careful resource management and strategic play.

The deck focuses on using a combination of control spells and card draw to outlast opponents, while leveraging abilities from cards like Abandon Attachments and Accumulate Wisdom to manipulate the battlefield. By utilizing Izzet Control cards like Combustion Technique and Stormchaser's Talent, the deck aims to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's strategies. With a mix of removal, card advantage, and resilient threats like Gran-Gran, the deck is able to adapt to various situations and come out on top in the late game.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board and apply pressure on the opponent using a combination of cheap spells and creatures with disruptive effects. By utilizing a mix of direct damage, card draw, and bounce spells, the deck aims to outpace and overwhelm the opponent while maintaining card advantage through cards like Opt and Soul-Guide Lantern. The inclusion of evasion creatures like Kaito, Cunning Infiltrator and Tiger-Seal further enhances the aggressive nature of the deck, allowing for quick and decisive victories.

This deck focuses on assembling a team of powerful Allies to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. Cards like Aang, Swift Savior and Earth King's Lieutenant provide powerful effects when other Allies are on the battlefield, while cards like Earth Kingdom Protectors and Boiling Rock Rioter offer strong bodies to pressure the opponent. By utilizing the Allies synergy and efficient mana base, this deck aims to establish a dominant board presence and close out the game before the opponent can mount a defense.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient spells and creatures to deal quick and consistent damage to the opponent. By utilizing a mix of burn spells, creatures with quick abilities, and card draw, it aims to overwhelm the opponent early in the game and finish them off before they can stabilize. The deck also includes cards that can provide additional value or disrupt the opponent's strategy, allowing for flexibility and adaptation to different matchups. By carefully managing resources and playing aggressively, this deck can put pressure on the opponent and secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. Using efficient threats like Stormchaser's Talent and Riverpyre Verge, combined with removal spells like Torch the Tower and Abrade, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage to the opponent. The deck also includes card draw spells like Opt and Quantum Riddler to maintain card advantage. With a mix of creatures, burn spells, and card draw, this UR Aggro deck aims to apply pressure early and finish the game quickly.

The deck revolves around quickly filling up the graveyard with creatures and then bringing them back onto the battlefield with powerful reanimation spells. The key strategy is to use cards like Awaken the Honored Dead and Bringer of the Last Gift to cheat out big creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Harvester of Misery. The deck also includes cards like Analyze the Pollen and Bitter Triumph to help control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient combo.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing a combination of evasive creatures like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner, along with removal spells like Heartless Act and Tragic Trajectory, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage quickly. Additionally, cards like Enduring Curiosity and Tishana's Tidebinder provide card advantage and tempo advantage, helping the player maintain momentum throughout the game. Overall, this deck focuses on applying pressure early and disrupting the opponent's strategy to secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize a combination of cards that allow for powerful creatures to be reanimated from the graveyard and brought back onto the battlefield. By strategically leveraging cards like Analyze the Pollen and Awaken the Honored Dead, players can quickly bring out high-impact creatures like Bringer of the Last Gift and Superior Spider-Man. The combination of combo and reanimator strategies creates a potent synergy that can overwhelm opponents and lead to swift victories. The deck aims to exploit powerful creature abilities and graveyard interactions to gain a strategic advantage.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent. By combining reanimation spells like Awaken the Honored Dead with powerful creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Harvester of Misery, the deck aims to create a board state that is difficult for the opponent to handle. Additionally, cards like Analyze the Pollen and Blooming Marsh provide card draw and mana fixing to keep the engine running smoothly. The deck's strength lies in its ability to quickly assemble a powerful board presence out of nowhere.

The main concept of this deck is utilizing fast, aggressive red creatures and direct damage spells to quickly bring down the opponent's life total. By playing efficient, low-cost cards like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, along with powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Burnout Bashtronaut, the goal is to put constant pressure on the opponent and finish the game as quickly as possible. The inclusion of Possibility Technician and Soulstone Sanctuary allows for some resilience against removal spells or board wipes, while Rockface Village provides additional mana fixing.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and spells to put pressure on the opponent and finish the game quickly. The deck includes a mix of cheap and efficient creatures like Quantum Riddler and Duelist of the Mind, along with removal spells like Boomerang Basics and Torch the Tower to clear the way for attacks. The deck also includes card draw and synergy cards like Fear of Missing Out and Stormchaser's Talent to maintain card advantage and keep the aggression going. The mana base is optimized for consistent casting of spells and aggression.

This deck focuses on using Izzet Control to slow down your opponent's strategy while building up your own resources. With spells like Stormchaser's Talent and Combustion Technique, you can control the board and disrupt your opponent's plans. Utilizing cards like Multiversal Passage and Riverpyre Verge, you can fix your mana base and ensure you have access to the right colors of mana. With cards like Boomerang Basics and Firebending Lesson, you can deal with threats efficiently while generating value. Overall, this deck aims to outlast and outsmart your opponent with careful resource management and card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of card draw, removal, and board presence. By utilizing powerful spells like Stormchaser's Talent, Combustion Technique, Multiversal Passage, and Firebending Lesson, the player can effectively control the opponent's strategy while building their own resources. Monument to Endurance and Riverpyre Verge provide additional support and mana fixing. The inclusion of Agna Qel'a and Iroh's Demonstration adds versatility and unique abilities to the deck. Overall, this Izzet Control deck aims to outsmart and outmaneuver the opponent with careful card selection and strategic plays.

The deck revolves around utilizing Aang, Swift Savior and Aang, at the Crossroads to trigger powerful effects from Airbender Ascension. Meticulous Archive and Floodfarm Verge are used to filter through the deck quickly to find combo pieces. Doc Aurlock, Grizzled Genius and Multiversal Passage provide additional utility and search options. Bramble Familiar and Appa, Steadfast Guardian offer protection and control options, while Quantum Riddler adds a bit of disruption to the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to create a strong board presence through synergy between various cards in the Bant Airbending archetype.
